        public void testEncryptPassword()

      • testEncryptPasswordHelper

        private void testEncryptPasswordHelper(java.lang.String password,
                             java.lang.String salt,
                             java.lang.String expected)
        Runs CryptUtils.encryptPassword(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) and check if the result is the expected value.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to encrypt...
        salt - ...with this salt.
        expected - What is the result? (hopefully)

      • testGenerateSalt

        public void testGenerateSalt()
        Tests CryptUtils.generateSalt(): Generate two salt, check its format and check if its not equal. This method tests NOT if the generated salts are really random. (This would be to complex, so see the implementation to check it.)

      • checkSalt

        Check if the value is a hex encoded 160-bit-value salt.
        Parameters:
        actual - String to check.
